00074 WSESWrapperMain::~WSESWrapperMain()
00075 {
00076   abortAcquisitionEvent_.set();
00077   if (lib_->isLoaded())
00078   {
00079     if (initialized_)
00080       lib_->GDS_Finalize();
00081     lib_->unload();
00082   }
00083 }

00104 void WSESWrapperMain::release()
00105 {
00106   if (references_ == 1)
00107   {
00108     delete this_;
00109     this_ = 0;
00110     references_ = 0;
00111   }
00112   else if (references_ > 0)
00113     references_--;
00114 }

00152 int WSESWrapperMain::initialize(void *reserved)
00153 {
00154   int errorCode = WError::ERR_OK;
00155 
00156   if (initialized_)
00157     return WError::ERR_OK;
00158 
00159   instrumentLoaded_ = false;
00160   
00161   instrumentLibraryName_ = workingDir_;
00162   if (workingDir_.empty())
00163     instrumentLibraryName_ = "dll\\SESInstrument.dll";
00164   else
00165     instrumentLibraryName_.append("\\dll\\SESInstrument.dll");
00166 
00167   std:string path = workingDir_;
00168   path.append("/ini/Ses.ini");
00169   int bufferLength = 2048;
00170   char* fromFileResult = new char[bufferLength];
00171   memset(fromFileResult, 0, bufferLength);
00172 
00173   DWORD length = GetPrivateProfileString("Global", "Detector Interface", "None", fromFileResult, bufferLength, path.c_str());
00174   path = fromFileResult;
00175   std::replace(path.begin(), path.end(), '\\', ' ');
00176   if (path == "dll Detector Detector_Graph.dll")
00177   {
00178     path = workingDir_;
00179     path.append("/ini/DetectorGraph.ini");
00180     bufferLength = 2048;
00181     length = GetPrivateProfileString("global", "direct_viewer", "None", fromFileResult, bufferLength, path.c_str());
00182     path = fromFileResult;
00183     if (path == "true")
00184       return WError::ERR_QT_RUNNING;
00185   }
00186   delete[] fromFileResult;
00187 
00188         char *tmpDir = _getcwd(0, 0);
00189 
00190   if (!lib_->isLoaded() && !lib_->load(instrumentLibraryName_.c_str()))
00191     errorCode = WError::ERR_LOAD_LIBRARY;
00192 
00193   if (errorCode == WError::ERR_OK && lib_->GDS_Initialize(errorNotify, 0) != 0)
00194     errorCode = WError::ERR_INITIALIZE_FAIL;
00195 
00196   _chdir(tmpDir);
00197   free(tmpDir);
00198   
00199   initialized_ = (errorCode == WError::ERR_OK);
00200 
00201   // Create sesGui database
00202   sesGUI_.clear();
00203   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_InstallInstrument", lib_->GDS_InstallInstrument));
00204   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_InstallSupplies", lib_->GDS_InstallSupplies));
00205   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_InstallElements", lib_->GDS_InstallElements));
00206   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_InstallLensModes", lib_->GDS_InstallLensModes));
00207   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_SetupSignals", lib_->GDS_SetupSignals));
00208   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_CalibrateVoltages", lib_->GDS_CalibrateVoltages));
00209   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_CalibrateDetector", lib_->GDS_CalibrateDetector));
00210   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_ControlSupplies", lib_->GDS_ControlSupplies));
00211   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_SupplyInfo", lib_->GDS_SupplyInfo));
00212   sesGUI_.insert(std::pair<std::string, guiCallback>("GDS_DetectorInfo", lib_->GDS_DetectorInfo));
00213 
00214   return errorCode;
00215 }

00228 int WSESWrapperMain::finalize()
00229 {
00230   instrumentLoaded_ = false;
00231   initialized_ = false;
00232 
00233   abortAcquisitionEvent_.set();
00234   
00235   if (lib_->isLoaded())
00236   {
00237     lib_->GDS_Finalize();
00238     lib_->unload();
00239   }
00240   
00241   return WError::ERR_OK;
00242 }

00265 int WSESWrapperMain::getProperty(const char *property, int index, void *value, int &size)
00266 {
00267         PropertyMap::iterator it = properties_.find(property);
00268         if (it == properties_.end())
00269         {
00270                 if (lib_->SC_GetProperty == 0)
00271                         return WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00272 
00273                 int error = lib_->SC_GetProperty(property, value, &size);
00274                 if (error == 0)
00275                         return WError::ERR_OK;
00276                 if (error == -1)
00277                         return WError::ERR_PARAMETER_NOT_FOUND;
00278                 else
00279                         return WError::ERR_WRONG_SIZE;
00280         }
00281         return it->second.get(index, value, size);
00282 
00283         int error = lib_->SC_GetProperty(property, value, &size);
00284         return error;
00285 }

00292 int WSESWrapperMain::getProperty(const char *name, int index, void *value)
00293 {
00294   int size = 0;
00295   return getProperty(name, index, value, size);
00296 }

00312 int WSESWrapperMain::setProperty(const char *property, int size, const void *value)
00313 {
00314   PropertyMap::iterator it = properties_.find(property);
00315   if (it == properties_.end())
00316   {
00317     if (lib_->SC_SetPropertyEx != 0)
00318       return lib_->SC_SetPropertyEx(property, value, size) == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00319     if (lib_->SC_SetProperty != 0)
00320       return lib_->SC_SetProperty(property, value) == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00321     return WError::ERR_PARAMETER_NOT_FOUND;
00322   }
00323   return it->second.set(size, value);
00324 }
00325 
00340 int WSESWrapperMain::validate(const char *elementSet, const char *lensMode, double passEnergy, double kineticEnergy)
00341 {
00342   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00343     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00344 
00345   int i = 0; 
00346 
00347   if (std::find(elementSets_.begin(), elementSets_.end(), elementSet) == elementSets_.end())
00348     return WError::ERR_INCORRECT_ELEMENT_SET;
00349 
00350   if (std::find(lensModes_.begin(), lensModes_.end(), lensMode) == lensModes_.end())
00351     return WError::ERR_INCORRECT_LENS_MODE;
00352 
00353   DoubleVector passEnergies;
00354   loadPassEnergies(lensMode, passEnergies);
00355   if (std::find(passEnergies.begin(), passEnergies.end(), passEnergy) == passEnergies.end())
00356     return WError::ERR_INCORRECT_PASS_ENERGY;
00357 
00358   return WError::ERR_OK;
00359 }

00396 int WSESWrapperMain::loadInstrument(const char *fileName)
00397 {
00398   instrumentLoaded_ = false;
00399   memset(&sesInstrumentInfo_, 0, sizeof(SesNS::WInstrumentInfo));
00400 
00401   if (!initialized_)
00402     return WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00403 
00404   if (*fileName == 0)
00405   {
00406     std:string path = workingDir_;
00407     path.append("/ini/Ses.ini");
00408     int bufferLength = 2048;
00409     char* fromFileResult = new char[bufferLength];
00410     memset(fromFileResult, 0, bufferLength);
00411     DWORD length = GetPrivateProfileString("Global", "Instrument Prefs", "None", fromFileResult, bufferLength, path.c_str());
00412     path = workingDir_;
00413     path.append("\\");
00414     path.append(fromFileResult);
00415     delete[] fromFileResult;
00416     return loadInstrument(path.c_str());
00417   }
00418 
00419   if (*fileName == 0)
00420     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
00421 
00422   lib_->GDS_GetDetectorInfo(&sesDetectorInfo_);
00423   int errorCode = lib_->GDS_LoadInstrument(fileName);
00424   if (errorCode < 100 || errorCode > 110)
00425   {
00426     lib_->GDS_GetInstrumentInfo(&sesInstrumentInfo_);
00427     int length = *sesInstrumentInfo_.Model;
00428     memcpy(sesInstrumentInfo_.Model, sesInstrumentInfo_.Model + 1, length);
00429     sesInstrumentInfo_.Model[length] = 0;
00430     length = *sesInstrumentInfo_.SerialNo;
00431     memcpy(sesInstrumentInfo_.SerialNo, sesInstrumentInfo_.SerialNo + 1, length);
00432     sesInstrumentInfo_.SerialNo[length] = 0;
00433     instrumentLoaded_ = true;
00434 
00435     loadElementSets();
00436     loadLensModes();
00437     if (lensModes_.size() > 0)
00438       loadPassEnergies(lensModes_[0], passEnergies_);
00439     loadElementNames();
00440     if (elementNames_.size() == 0)
00441       errorCode = WError::ERR_FAIL;
00442   }
00443   else
00444     errorCode = WError::ERR_OPEN_INSTRUMENT;
00445 
00446   lib_->GDS_GetGlobalDetector(&sesDetectorRegion_);
00447   sesRegion_.ADCMask = sesDetectorRegion_.ADCMask;
00448   sesRegion_.ADCMode = sesDetectorRegion_.ADCMode;
00449   sesRegion_.DiscLvl = sesDetectorRegion_.DiscLvl;
00450   sesRegion_.FirstXChannel = sesDetectorRegion_.FirstXChannel;
00451   sesRegion_.FirstYChannel = sesDetectorRegion_.FirstYChannel;
00452   sesRegion_.LastXChannel = sesDetectorRegion_.LastXChannel;
00453   sesRegion_.LastYChannel = sesDetectorRegion_.LastYChannel;
00454   sesRegion_.Slices = sesDetectorRegion_.Slices;
00455 
00456   return errorCode;
00457 }

00624 int WSESWrapperMain::checkAnalyzerRegion(WAnalyzerRegion *analyzerRegion, int *steps, double *time_ms, double *minEnergyStep_eV)
00625 {
00626   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00627     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00628 
00629   int error = lib_->GDS_CheckRegion(&sesRegion_, steps, time_ms, minEnergyStep_eV);
00630   analyzerRegion->centerEnergy_ = sesRegion_.FixEnergy;
00631   analyzerRegion->dwellTime_ = sesRegion_.StepTime;
00632   analyzerRegion->energyStep_ = sesRegion_.EnergyStep;
00633   analyzerRegion->fixed_ = sesRegion_.Fixed;
00634   analyzerRegion->highEnergy_ = sesRegion_.HighEnergy;
00635   analyzerRegion->lowEnergy_ = sesRegion_.LowEnergy;
00636   return error == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_INCORRECT_ANALYZER_REGION;
00637 }
00638 
00654 int WSESWrapperMain::initAcquisition(const bool blockPointReady, const bool blockRegionReady)
00655 {
00656   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00657     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00658 
00659   int sesStatus = SesNS::NonOperational;
00660   if (lib_->GDS_GetStatus != 0)
00661     lib_->GDS_GetStatus(&sesStatus);
00662 
00663   if (sesStatus == SesNS::Running)
00664     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
00665 
00666   abortAcquisitionEvent_.reset();
00667   pointReadyEvent_.reset();
00668   regionReadyEvent_.reset();
00669   continueAcquisitionEvent_.reset();
00670 
00671   blockPointReady_ = blockPointReady;
00672   blockRegionReady_ = blockRegionReady;
00673   iteration_ = 0;
00674   sesSpectrum_ = 0;
00675   currentStep_ = 0;
00676   currentPoint_ = std::numeric_limits<int>::min();
00677 
00678   int result = 0;
00679 
00680   if (tempFileName_.empty())
00681     tempFileName_ = "work\\seswrapper";
00682   DeleteFile(tempFileName_.c_str());
00683 
00684   if (lib_->GDS_InitAcquisition != 0)
00685   {
00686     result = lib_->GDS_InitAcquisition(&sesRegion_, &sesSpectrum_, &sesSignals_, tempFileName_.c_str(), WSESWrapperMain::pointReady, WSESWrapperMain::regionReady);
00687   }
00688 
00689   startTime_ = clock();
00690 
00691   return result >= 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00692 }
00693 
00712 int WSESWrapperMain::startAcquisition()
00713 {
00714   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00715     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00716 
00717   int sesStatus = SesNS::NonOperational;
00718   lib_->GDS_GetStatus(&sesStatus);
00719   if (sesStatus == SesNS::Running)
00720     return WError::ERR_ACQUIRING;
00721   startTime_ = clock();
00722   abortAcquisitionEvent_.reset();
00723   pointReadyEvent_.reset();
00724   regionReadyEvent_.reset();
00725   currentStep_ = 0;
00726 
00727   if (lib_->GDS_UseDetector != 0)
00728     lib_->GDS_UseDetector((activeDetectors_ & 0x0001) != 0);
00729   if (lib_->GDS_UseSignals != 0)
00730   {
00731     lib_->GDS_UseSignals((activeDetectors_ & 0x0002) != 0);
00732   }
00733 
00734   int result = 0;
00735   
00736   if (resetDataBetweenIterations_)
00737     iteration_ = 1;
00738   else
00739     iteration_++;
00740 
00741   result = lib_->GDS_Start(&sesRegion_, &sesSpectrum_, tempFileName_.c_str(), iteration_, WSESWrapperMain::pointReady, WSESWrapperMain::regionReady);
00742 
00743   if (lib_->GDS_GetCurrSignals != 0)
00744     lib_->GDS_GetCurrSignals(&sesSignals_);
00745 
00746   return result >= 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00747 }
00748 
00756 int WSESWrapperMain::stopAcquisition()
00757 {
00758   if (!lib_->isLoaded())
00759     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00760 
00761   abortAcquisitionEvent_.set();
00762   pointReadyEvent_.reset();
00763   regionReadyEvent_.reset();
00764 
00765   return lib_->GDS_Stop() == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00766 }
00767 
00782 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcquiredData(const char *variable, int index, void *data, int &size)
00783 {
00784   DataParameterMap::iterator it = dataParameters_.find(variable);
00785   if (it == dataParameters_.end())
00786     return WError::ERR_PARAMETER_NOT_FOUND;
00787 
00788   return it->second.get(index, data, size);
00789 }
00790 
00808 int WSESWrapperMain::waitForPointReady(int timeout_ms)
00809 {
00810   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00811     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00812 
00813   int sesStatus = SesNS::NonOperational;
00814   lib_->GDS_GetStatus(&sesStatus);
00815 
00816   if (sesStatus != SesNS::Running)
00817     return WError::ERR_OK;
00818 
00819   const HANDLE handles[] = {pointReadyEvent_.handle(), abortAcquisitionEvent_.handle()};
00820   DWORD result = WaitForMultipleObjects(2, handles, FALSE, timeout_ms);
00821   return result == WAIT_TIMEOUT ? WError::ERR_TIMEOUT : WError::ERR_OK;
00822 }
00823 
00840 int WSESWrapperMain::waitForRegionReady(int timeout_ms)
00841 {
00842   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00843     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00844 
00845   int sesStatus = SesNS::NonOperational;
00846   lib_->GDS_GetStatus(&sesStatus);
00847 
00848   if (sesStatus != SesNS::Running)
00849     return WError::ERR_OK;
00850 
00851   const HANDLE handles[] = {regionReadyEvent_.handle(), abortAcquisitionEvent_.handle()};
00852   DWORD result = WaitForMultipleObjects(2, handles, FALSE, timeout_ms);
00853   return result == WAIT_TIMEOUT ? WError::ERR_TIMEOUT : WError::ERR_OK;
00854 }
00855 
00864 int WSESWrapperMain::continueAcquisition()
00865 {
00866   pointReadyEvent_.reset();
00867   continueAcquisitionEvent_.set();
00868   return WError::ERR_OK;
00869 }

00871 int WSESWrapperMain::openGui(const char* name)
00872 {
00873         SesGuiMap::iterator p = sesGUI_.find(name);
00874         if (p != sesGUI_.end())
00875         {
00876                 return p->second();
00877         }
00878         return 0;
00879 }
00880 
00881 
00882 int WSESWrapperMain::setupDetector(SESWrapperNS::PDetectorRegion detectorRegion)
00883 {
00884         if (lib_->GDS_SetupDetector != 0)
00885         {
00886                 sesDetectorRegion_.ADCMode = detectorRegion->adcMode_;
00887                 sesDetectorRegion_.FirstXChannel = detectorRegion->firstXChannel_;
00888                 sesDetectorRegion_.LastXChannel = detectorRegion->lastXChannel_;
00889                 sesDetectorRegion_.FirstYChannel = detectorRegion->firstYChannel_;
00890                 sesDetectorRegion_.LastYChannel = detectorRegion->lastYChannel_;
00891                 sesDetectorRegion_.Slices = detectorRegion->slices_;
00892 
00893                 int error = lib_->GDS_SetupDetector(&sesDetectorRegion_) == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00894                 if (error == 0)
00895                 {
00896                         detectorRegion->adcMode_ = sesDetectorRegion_.ADCMode;
00897                         detectorRegion->firstXChannel_ = sesDetectorRegion_.FirstXChannel;
00898                         detectorRegion->lastXChannel_ = sesDetectorRegion_.LastXChannel;
00899                         detectorRegion->firstYChannel_ = sesDetectorRegion_.FirstYChannel;
00900                         detectorRegion->lastYChannel_ = sesDetectorRegion_.LastYChannel;
00901                         detectorRegion->slices_ = sesDetectorRegion_.Slices;
00902                 }
00903                 return 0;
00904         }
00905         return WError::ERR_OPEN_INSTRUMENT;
00906 }
00907 
00913 int WSESWrapperMain::checkProperty(const char* name, int size)
00914 {
00915         int property_size = 0;
00916         double tmp_value = 0;
00917         int error = getProperty(name, 0, 0, property_size);
00918         if ((error == WError::ERR_OK) || (error == WError::ERR_WRONG_SIZE))
00919                 if (property_size == size)
00920                         error = WError::ERR_OK;
00921 
00922         return error;
00923 }
00924 
00930 int WSESWrapperMain::parameterType(const char *name)
00931 {
00932   PropertyMap::iterator p = properties_.find(name);
00933   if (p != properties_.end())
00934     return p->second.valueType();
00935 
00936   DataParameterMap::iterator dp = dataParameters_.find(name);
00937   if (dp != dataParameters_.end())
00938     return dp->second.valueType();
00939 
00940   return -1;
00941 }

01114 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqImage(int index, void *data, int &size)
01115 {
01116   if (!readSpectrumObject())
01117     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
01118 
01119   if (data != 0)
01120   {
01121     double *doubleData = reinterpret_cast<double *>(data);
01122     int sliceSize = sesSpectrum_->Channels * sizeof(double);
01123       for (int slice = 0; slice < sesSpectrum_->Slices; slice++, doubleData += sesSpectrum_->Channels)
01124         memcpy(doubleData, sesSpectrum_->Data[slice], sliceSize);
01125   }
01126   size = sesSpectrum_->Channels * sesSpectrum_->Slices;
01127         return WError::ERR_OK;
01128 }

01141 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqSlice(int index, void *data, int &size)
01142 {
01143   if (!readSpectrumObject())
01144     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
01145 
01146   if (index < 0 || index >= sesSpectrum_->Slices)
01147     return WError::ERR_INDEX;
01148 
01149   if (data != 0)
01150     memcpy(data, sesSpectrum_->Data[index], sesSpectrum_->Channels * sizeof(double));
01151 
01152   size = sesSpectrum_->Channels;
01153   return WError::ERR_OK;
01154 }

01199 
01222 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqRawImage(int index, void *data, int &size)
01223 {
01224   unsigned char *uCharData = reinterpret_cast<unsigned char *>(data);
01225   int errorCode = lib_->GDS_GetRawImage != 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
01226   int width = sesDetectorInfo_.XChannels;
01227   int height = sesDetectorInfo_.YChannels;
01228   int byteSize = 1;
01229 
01230   if (size < width * height * byteSize)
01231           errorCode = WError::ERR_INCORRECT_DETECTOR_REGION;
01232   
01233   if (errorCode == WError::ERR_OK)
01234   {
01235     if (data != 0)
01236       errorCode = lib_->GDS_GetRawImage(uCharData, &width, &height, &byteSize) == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
01237     size = width * height * byteSize;
01238   }
01239         return errorCode;
01240 }

01441 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqIOData(int index, void *data, int &size)
01442 {
01443   if (!readSignalsObject())
01444     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
01445 
01446   if (data != 0)
01447   {
01448     double *doubleData = reinterpret_cast<double *>(data);
01449     int channelSize = sesSignals_->Steps * sizeof(double);
01450       for (int channel = 0; channel < sesSignals_->Count; channel++, doubleData += channelSize)
01451         memcpy(doubleData, sesSignals_->Data[channel], channelSize);
01452   }
01453   size = sesSignals_->Count * sesSignals_->Steps;
01454   return WError::ERR_OK;
01455 }

01469 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqIOPortName(int index, void *data, int &size)
01470 {
01471   if (!readSignalsObject())
01472     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
01473   
01474   if (data != 0)
01475   {
01476     if (index < 0 || index >= sizeof(SesNS::Char32))
01477       return WError::ERR_INDEX;
01478     memcpy(data, sesSignals_->Names[index], std::min(size, (int)sizeof(SesNS::Char32)));
01479   }
01480   size = strlen(sesSignals_->Names[index]);
01481         return WError::ERR_OK;
01482 }

01503 
01517 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqPointIntensity(int index, void *data, int &size)
01518 {
01519   if (!readSpectrumObject())
01520     return WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
01521 
01522   if (data != 0)
01523   {
01524     double *doubleValue = reinterpret_cast<double *>(data);
01525 
01526     if (index < 0 || index >= sesSpectrum_->Channels)
01527     {
01528       *doubleValue = 0;
01529       return WError::ERR_OK;
01530     }
01531   
01532     *doubleValue = sesSpectrum_->SumData[index];
01533   }
01534   return WError::ERR_OK;
01535 }
01536 
01550 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqChannelIntensity(int index, void *data, int &size)
01551 {
01552   if (!readSpectrumObject())
01553     return WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
01554 
01555   if (data != 0)
01556   {
01557     double *doubleVector = reinterpret_cast<double *>(data);
01558     double *p = doubleVector;
01559 
01560     if (index < 0 || index >= sesSpectrum_->Channels)
01561     {
01562       for (int r = 0; r < sesSpectrum_->Slices; r++)
01563         *p++ = 0;
01564     }
01565     else
01566     {
01567       for (int r = 0; r < sesSpectrum_->Slices; r++)
01568         *p++ = sesSpectrum_->Data[r][index];
01569     }
01570   }
01571 
01572   size = sesSpectrum_->Slices;
01573   return WError::ERR_OK;
01574 }

01584 void __stdcall WSESWrapperMain::errorNotify(int errorCode)
01585 {
01586   this_->errorNotifyHandler(errorCode);
01587 }
01588 
01592 void WSESWrapperMain::errorNotifyHandler(int errorCode)
01593 {
01594   const char *buffer = lib_->GDS_GetLastErrorString();
01595   std::ofstream oFile("seswrapper.log", std::ios::out | std::ios::app);
01596   time_t t = time(0);
01597   std::string tStr = ctime(&t);
01598   int pos = tStr.find('\n');
01599   if (pos != tStr.npos)
01600     tStr = tStr.substr(0, pos);
01601   oFile << "[" << tStr << "] SesInstrument Error " << errorCode << ": " << buffer << std::endl;
01602 }
01603 
01613 void __stdcall WSESWrapperMain::pointReady(int point)
01614 {
01615   this_->pointReadyHandler(point);
01616 }
01617 
01621 void WSESWrapperMain::pointReadyHandler(int point)
01622 {
01623   currentStep_++;
01624   currentPoint_ = point;
01625   pointReadyEvent_.set();
01626 
01627   if (blockPointReady_)
01628   {
01629     HANDLE handles[] = {continueAcquisitionEvent_.handle(), abortAcquisitionEvent_.handle()};
01630     WaitForMultipleObjects(2, handles, FALSE, INFINITE);
01631     continueAcquisitionEvent_.reset();
01632   }
01633 }
01634 
01642 void __stdcall WSESWrapperMain::regionReady()
01643 {
01644   this_->regionReadyHandler();
01645 }
01646 
01650 void WSESWrapperMain::regionReadyHandler()
01651 {
01652   regionReadyEvent_.set();
01653 }
01654 
01660 bool WSESWrapperMain::readSpectrumObject()
01661 {
01662   SesNS::WSpectrum *tmpSpectrum = sesSpectrum_;
01663   if (lib_->GDS_GetCurrSpectrum != 0)
01664     lib_->GDS_GetCurrSpectrum(&tmpSpectrum);
01665   if (tmpSpectrum != 0)
01666     sesSpectrum_ = tmpSpectrum;
01667   return (sesSpectrum_ != 0);
01668 }
01669 
01675 bool WSESWrapperMain::readSignalsObject()
01676 {
01677   SesNS::WSignals *tmpSignals = sesSignals_;
01678   if (lib_->GDS_GetCurrSignals != 0)
01679     lib_->GDS_GetCurrSignals(&tmpSignals);
01680   if (tmpSignals != 0)
01681     sesSignals_ = tmpSignals;
01682   return (sesSignals_ != 0);
01683 }
